sentences.en: A lion's mane jellyfish nestled in a kelp frond.
sentences.cn: 一只狮鬃水母呆在一片海藻叶子中.

sentences.en: A: Mr. Johnson, There is a Mircrobus waiting at the frond door.
sentences.cn: 约翰逊先生, 面包车正等在门口.

sentences.en: Don't walk in frond of me I may not follow.
sentences.cn: 不要走在我前面,我可能跟不上.

sentences.en: The apical cell and cell act as the ancestor cells of frond and rhizoid.
sentences.cn: 两个细胞分别成为叶片和假根的祖细胞.

sentences.en: The neoplastic glands are long and frond - like , similar to those seen in a villous adenoma.
sentences.cn: 肿瘤腺体长并呈叶 状, 与绒毛状腺瘤所见相似.

sentences.en: When frond is short of magnesium, what effect can you have to the plant?
sentences.cn: 植物体缺镁的时候, 会对植物有什么影响?

sentences.en: You can also wrap a tree in palm tree frond leaves, cornstalks or fiberglass.
sentences.cn: 还可以用棕榈叶, 玉米秆或玻璃纤维将树木包裹起来.

trans.tran_cn: 蕨类或棕榈类植物的叶子
trans.tran_en: a leaf of a  fern  or  palm 1 2
